title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Nelson H. Hotchkiss, June 4, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss writes to his brother to ask him to hire someone to help Hotchkiss' wife on the farm. He also relates news about the army, including the exploits of General Ashby.
keywords: Death/Casualties, National Government, Enlistment, Military Authority, Patriotism, Church/Religious Authority, Slavery, African Americans, Battle Description, American Civil War
